# This file was generated based on the Python scripts in the 'padayani' directory.
# Note: Specific versions are not included. For a fully reproducible environment,
# you may want to freeze your working virtual environment's versions using:
# pip freeze > requirements.txt

# Core computer vision and data manipulation library
opencv-python

# Used for array operations, often a dependency of other CV libraries
numpy

# For YOLOv8 object and pose detection models
ultralytics

# For ZED stereo camera integration (used in ZED-specific scripts)
# This is often installed from a specific .whl file provided by Stereolabs
pyzed

# Used in some prototype scripts for alternative pose/face detection
tensorflow
mediapipe
